title: Al Michaels Has the Call
description:
Michael Daly of the Daily Beast on the challenges ahead for new NYPD academy graduates and Mayor Bill de Blasio. Plus, sportscasting legend Al Michaels on his infamous "Miracle on Ice" call. And in the Spiel, "Cos" and effect.
